Name: SnakeGame
About the game: SnakeGame is an arena shooter about a huge snake that escaped from the laboratory, found a shotgun and decided to take revenge on all its enemies. Destroy soldiers, wreak havoc, eat all the enemies on your way, become the biggest snake on this planet. And if you can't eat someone, then just shoot him with a shotgun, because you are a snake with a shotgun. the game is based on the game of the same name of the 2000s 'snake', the game itself is complicated by the fact that enemies in the form of soldiers appear on the field and attack you, fill the field as soon as possible so that the enemy does not have time to destroy you. The number of waves of enemies increases, be extremely careful, if you leave the field, you will also die.
